newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Crown Equities rights offering gets SEC nod.
newsitem.headline: Crown Equities rights offering gets SEC nod.

text.p: The Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) said on Thursday it has approved the pre-emptive rights offering of Crown Equities Inc involving a minimum of 500 million shares to one billion shares.

Crown Equities said in documents submitted to the SEC that a stockholder will be entitled to subscriber to at least one share for every two shares held to a maximum of one share for every share of stock held.
The offering will raise 750 million to 1.8 billion pesos.
The shares will be offered an a price between 1.50 pesos to 1.80 pesos per share.
